trans-unit.source: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建和管理的类型安全的有序集合提供标准功能<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This collection supports standard zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 此集合支持标准的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table.RowGroups%2A> property provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> class returns a TableRowGroupCollection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table.RowGroups%2A>由提供属性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>类返回 TableRowGroupCollection。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table.RowGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Manipulate a Table's Row Groups through the RowGroups Property](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 操作通过行组属性的表的行组](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Appends a specified item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的项追加到集合。

trans-unit.source: An item to append to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要追加到集合的项。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *item* already belongs to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*项*已属于集合。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *item* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*项*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此集合的预分配的集合项容量。

trans-unit.source: The Capacity property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A> property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 容量属性表示在此集合中存储项的预分配槽的数量，而<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>属性表示集合中当前项的实际数目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of Capacity is always at least as large as the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 容量的值并总是至少与<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>值一样大

trans-unit.source: When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items.
trans-unit.target: 如果新添加的集合项导致集合计数超过集合容量，则容量是自动增大以容纳新添加的集合项。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead.
trans-unit.target: 增加集合容量包括分配其他集合槽，这会产生性能和内存开销。

trans-unit.source: Use the Capacity property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: 使用容量属性来优化在集合项的总值或最大数目提前知道的情况下的集合容量。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A> method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A>方法，使集合容量等于当前的集合计数。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 预先分配的集合项容量为此集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **8**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**8**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection.Capacity*> to a value that is less than the current value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试设置时，引发<> *1> 小于的当前值的值<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: Clears all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合中的所有项。

trans-unit.source: After calling Clear, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A> property becomes **0** and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> property is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 清除，调用的值后<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>属性变为**0**和的值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>属性保持不变。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set a new capacity, call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A> or explicitly set a new capacity through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置新的容量，调用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A>或显式设置通过新容量<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Queries for the presence of a specified item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的指定项存在的查询。

trans-unit.source: An item to query for the presence of in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 查询的集合中存在一个项。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the specified *item* is present in the collection; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果指定*项*存在于集合; 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the collection and inserts them into a specified array starting at a specified index position in the array.
trans-unit.target: 将集合的内容复制并将其插入到指定的数组，数组中的指定的索引位置开始。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array to which the collection contents will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 将集合内容将复制到其中的一维数组。

trans-unit.source: This array must use zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 此数组必须使用从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index in `array` specifying the position at which to begin inserting the copied collection objects.
trans-unit.target: 中的从零开始索引`array`指定从此处开始插入的复制的集合对象的位置。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *array* includes items that are not compatible with the type <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>, or if *arrayIndex* specifies a position that falls outside of the bounds of *array*.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*数组*包括与类型不兼容的项<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"> </xref>，或者如果*arrayIndex*指定超出的边界位置*数组*。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *array* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*数组*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *arrayIndex* is less than **0**.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*arrayIndex*是小于**0**。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the collection and inserts them into a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref> array of starting at a specified index position in the array.
trans-unit.target: 将集合的内容复制并将其插入到指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>的数组中的指定的索引位置开始的数组。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref> array to which the collection contents will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 一维<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>将集合内容复制到数组。

trans-unit.source: This array must use zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 此数组必须使用从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index in `array` specifying the position at which to begin inserting the copied collection objects.
trans-unit.target: 中的从零开始索引`array`指定从此处开始插入的复制的集合对象的位置。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *array* includes items that are not compatible with the type <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>, or if *arrayIndex* specifies a position that falls outside of the bounds of *array*.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*数组*包括与类型不兼容的项<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"> </xref>，或者如果*arrayIndex*指定超出的边界位置*数组*。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *array* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*数组*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *arrayIndex* is less than **0**.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*arrayIndex*是小于**0**。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items currently contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合当前包含的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the Count property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>属性表示在此集合中存储项的预分配槽的数量，而计数属性表示集合中当前项的实际数目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> is always at least as large as the value of Count.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>始终是计数的值至少一样大。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items.
trans-unit.target: 如果新添加的集合项导致集合计数超过集合容量，则容量是自动增大以容纳新添加的集合项。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead.
trans-unit.target: 增加集合容量包括分配其他集合槽，这会产生性能和内存开销。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>属性来优化在集合项的总值或最大数目提前知道的情况下的集合容量。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A> method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A>方法，使集合容量等于当前的集合计数。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.TrimToSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of items currently contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合当前包含的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of specified collection item.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的收集项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: A collection item to return the index of.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其索引的集合项。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the specified collection item, or **-1** if the specified item is not a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的集合项的从零开始索引或**-1**如果指定的项不是集合的成员。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a specified item in the collection at a specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的项插入集合中位于指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A> equals <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> for this collection, the collection capacity automatically is increased before the new item is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>等于<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A>对于此集合，则集合自动增大容量才能插入新项。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set *index* equal to the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>, to append a new collection item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 设置*索引*等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>、 要追加到集合的新的收集项。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indices for existing collection items may be adjusted to accommodate the newly inserted collection item.
trans-unit.target: 可能会调整现有集合项的索引，以容纳新插入的集合项。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that specifies the position in the collection at which to insert `item`.
trans-unit.target: 指定在其中插入集合中的位置的从零开始索引`item`。

trans-unit.source: An item to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要插入到集合的项。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than **0**.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*索引*是小于**0**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *item* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*项*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property always returns **false**.
trans-unit.target: 目前，此属性始终返回**false**。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property always returns **false**.
trans-unit.target: 目前，此属性始终返回**false**。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection item at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定索引处的集合项。

trans-unit.source: This is an indexed property.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个索引的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is an indexed property that supports standard indexing syntax (similar to that used to access a particular cell in an array).
trans-unit.target: 这是支持标准索引的语法 （类似于用来访问数组中的特定单元格） 的索引的属性。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index specifying the position of the collection item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，指定要检索的集合项的位置。

trans-unit.source: The collection item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的集合项。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*索引*小于零，或当*索引*大于或等于<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Removes a specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定的项。

trans-unit.source: Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection item.
trans-unit.target: 可能会调整剩余集合项的索引，以反映已移除的集合项。

trans-unit.source: An item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的项。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the specified item was found and removed; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果指定的项已找到并移除; 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: Raised if *item* is not present in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*项*在集合中不存在。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *item* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*项*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item, specified by index, from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的索引，从集合的项。

trans-unit.source: Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection item.
trans-unit.target: 可能会调整剩余集合项的索引，以反映已移除的集合项。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that specifies the collection item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 指定要删除的集合项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*索引*小于零，或当*索引*大于或等于<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Removes a range of items, specified by beginning index and count, from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除一定范围的指定的起始索引和计数，集合中的项目。

trans-unit.source: Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection items.
trans-unit.target: 可能会调整剩余集合项的索引，以反映已移除的集合项。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index indicating the beginning of a range of items to remove.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，指示要移除的项范围的开始处。

trans-unit.source: The number of items to remove, beginning form the position specified by `index`.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除，开始窗体指定的位置的项的数目`index`。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* or *count* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*索引*或*计数*小于零，或当*索引*大于或等于<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* and *count* do not specify a valid range in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 时引发*索引*和*计数*没有在此集合中指定的有效范围。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可用于循环访问集合的对象。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IList.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Add%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用类型安全<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Add%2A>方法相反。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>将添加到<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: 新元素的插入位置。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IList.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用类型安全<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法相反。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IList.Contains%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用类型安全<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Contains%2A>方法相反。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Capacity*> equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroupCollection.Count*> of items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置基础集合优化内存消耗找不到<> *1> 等于<> *1> 的集合中当前项。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法以最小化内存开销对于集合，尤其是如果集合包含的项集的预期为静态。
